attributes.action: Give funding for the support of the Air Ambulance Service throughout the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Air Ambulance Service is essential for outlying areas for emergency transport to hospital.

rejection.details:
There are already petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=air+ambulance
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
